About-me.subTitle: Adaptability | Assertive Communication | Creativity
About-me.paragraph: Seeking opportunities to improve and grow professionally. I'm always ready to face new challenges and take exciting web projects to the next level.

works.title: Works
works.paragraph: I am a passionate self-taught software developer seeking new challenges. I specialize in front-end and serverless backend development using TypeScript, React.js, and Node.js. Even when faced with challenging problems, I know how to address them with patience, determination, and unwavering perseverance.

seometric.achievements: Metrics System: I designed and implemented a metrics system to provide users with valuable insights into the performance and outcomes of their actions.|Data Selection Tables: I developed interactive tables that allowed users to mass-select data, enhancing efficiency and usability.|AI Testing Playground: I established a playground where users could conduct tests on the artificial intelligence we developed, utilizing technologies such as OpenAI and gpt3-tokenizer.|Document Import: I designed and programmed buttons that facilitated the import of documents in PDF, JSON, and CSV formats, enhancing platform interoperability.|Login System: I implemented a secure and user-friendly login system to ensure user authentication.|Design Process: I led the design process from the prototyping stage in Figma to code implementation, ensuring a consistent and engaging user experience.|Technologies Used: To develop this platform, I utilized technologies such as Next.js, Supabase, Theme UI, Zustand, OpenAI, and gpt3-tokenizer.

aini28.achievements: Designed the model in Figma.|Developed the website using Next.js and Sanity.|Implemented size filters to enable users to quickly find plush toys based on their preferences.|Added an efficient search bar to facilitate the discovery of specific products.|Created an interactive shopping cart and a quotation function.|Showcased special offers to increase the platform's appeal.

tesla.title: Tesla
tesla.paragraph: I have developed a replica of Tesla's homepage where I have implemented advanced design and navigation features. By using Intersection Observer technology, I achieved a dynamic effect on the typography color of the navigation bar, adapting it based on the visible section on the screen. Additionally, for a smooth and centered scrolling experience, I utilized the CSS property 'scroll-snap-type' on the sliders, ensuring that transitions between images are precise and engaging as users navigate through the featured content.

Threads.title: Threads
Threads.paragraph: I have created an application similar to Threads, but with a focus on creating communities. The platform allows users to create communities, make posts, and customize their profiles. This application provides an interactive and structured experience while encouraging participation around shared interests.

Promptopia.title: Promptopia
Promptopia.paragraph: A site where you can share your best prompts with the community. You can register with your Gmail account, create, edit, or share your prompts.
